I can't stop thinking about you and recalling our happy moments.
It was love which brought us together but now you hurt me so deep.

Don't leave me. Don't date other girls. I love you.

例子都冇學人開post


Today, our love relationship ends. It is my fifth time to break up in my life.
My honey, why you choose to leave me?
I love you so much but you don't love me any more.

I can't stop thinking about you and recalling our happy moments.
It was love which brought us together but now you hurt me so deep.

Don't leave me. Don't date other girls. I love you.


Today signifies the fifth occurrence of an end of a relationship.

Babe. Why did you choose to break up with me and end our relationship in such a way that I can sense my bleeding deep inside
My love for you remains as it has always been yet the same cannot be said for you.

I still remember the moments we shared in the past year. It was love that had brought us together and our relationship was built upon it.
Yet you have deeply wounded me.

Please do not leave me and please do not start dating another girl. I love you.

例子都冇學人開post


Today, our love relationship ends. It is my fifth time to break up in my life.
My honey, why you choose to leave me?
I love you so much but you don't love me any more.

I can't stop thinking about you and recalling our happy moments.
It was love which brought us together but now you hurt me so deep.

Don't leave me. Don't date other girls. I love you.


Today signifies the fifth occurrence of an end of a relationship.

Babe. Why did you choose to break up with me and end our relationship in such a way that I can sense my bleeding deep inside
My love for you remains as it has always been yet the same cannot be said for you.

I still remember the moments we shared in the past year. It was love that had brought us together and our relationship was built upon it.
Yet you have deeply wounded me.

Please do not leave me and please do not start dating another girl. I love you.
